name: 1986 Turn Back the Clock Marlene - thr33smas Insert - #3MAS2
description:
The Second Day of thr33smas

Second card in a series of 12 cards looking back at the highlights of the first 7 months of thr33som3s mints. 
 
For the Painting 3v3nt, thr33som3s offered up black and white paintings of veteran journeyman pitcher Tom Niedenfuer in drag as Marlene Dietrich in drag.  Over 30k inserts were ordered with the tempting, but vague, hint that they would include a new utility.

Collectors were encouraged to combine their new black and white Marlenes with existing color-focused Inserts.  By burning older Inserts along with the new Marlenes 18 different color hues were created, each resulting in a new painting of a new Marlene.  Collectors were assembling their very own "palettes" from which they would paint.  

This thr33smas version is a new painting of those original mints.

The 12 Days of thr33smas is a chase 3v3nt.  Collect all 12, #3MAS1 through #3MAS12, in the announced timeframe to receive #3MAS13 via airdrop.

This card is an INSERT. It has all established Standard Insert Utility and may compound additional Utilities over time. It is the very first thr33smas Insert and a Holiday Insert. ***** digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2021. ************ NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes to see upcoming cards and new series. ************ ALL thr33som3s have FUTURE UTILITY.
